text: Ciarán Clarke (born 1993) is an Irish hurler who plays as a left corner- forward for the Antrim senior team. Born in Ballycastle, County Antrim, Clarke first arrived on the inter-county scene at the age of sixteen when he first linked up with the Antrim minor team, before later joining the under-21 side. He made his senior debut during the 2013 championship. Clarke immediately became a regular member of the starting fifteen and has won one Ulster medal. Clarke has been a member of the Ulster inter-provincial team on a number of occasions, Fenton won three Railway Cup medals. At club level he plays with Ballycastle McQuillan. ==Honours== ===Team=== ;Antrim *Ulster Senior Hurling Championship (1): 2013 *Ulster Under-21 Hurling Championship (1): 2013 *Ulster Minor Hurling Championship (2): 2009, 2010 ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Ballycastle McQuillan hurlers Category:Antrim inter-county hurlers Category:Ulster inter-provincial hurlers
title: Ciarán Clarke
